QuestData.Title: The Secrets of Gorgrond
QuestData.Description: Commander, Durotan calls for aid in leading a small strike team into Gorgrond to launch a counter attack against the Iron Horde strongholds there.$b$bThe land is home to the Blackrock clan, industrial arm of the Iron Horde.$b$bIt is also home to some of the most savage giants and monsters in all of Draenor.$b$bIf you wish to answer this call to action, Gorgrond can be reached through the eastern side of Frostfire Ridge through Thunder Pass.
QuestData.RewardText: Gorgrond is no place for armies, Commander. We are now stepping into the domain of legends.
